```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(polynom)
```

```{r}
x <- read_csv(file = "djia.csv")

dat <- x |>
  mutate(ID = 1:61)|>
  mutate(average_value = (Open+High+Low+Close)/40000)|>
  select(ID,average_value)
  

a<-poly.calc(dat$ID,dat$average_value)

f <- function(x) {
  return(3.314282e+15 - 1.54506e+16*x + 3.331697e+16*x^2 - 4.471835e+16*x^3 +  
4.230691e+16*x^4 - 3.024092e+16*x^5 + 1.707641e+16*x^6 - 7.858374e+15*x^7  
+ 3.015665e+15*x^8 - 9.822387e+14*x^9 + 2.753637e+14*x^10 -  
6.720046e+13*x^11 + 1.441032e+13*x^12 - 2.736594e+12*x^13 +  
463300400000*x^14 - 70322580000*x^15 + 9616808000*x^16 - 1189909000*x^17 +  
133705600*x^18 - 13688090*x^19 + 1280338*x^20 - 109691.9*x^21 +  
8626.599*x^22 - 623.9468*x^23 + 41.57381*x^24 - 2.555529*x^25 +  
0.1450993*x^26 - 0.007617739*x^27 + 0.0003701155*x^28 - 1.665327e-05*x^29  
+ 6.942922e-07*x^30 - 2.683031e-08*x^31 )
}



```

```{r}
ggplot(dat, aes(x=ID, y=average_value)) + 
  geom_point(size=3, col='blue')+
  stat_function(fun = f, size=1.25, alpha=0.4)

```
